name: iMASTER CLEANSE
description:
32 oz jar

or Concentrated Bottle/Jar

Consisting of Electrolyte Water, Organic Lemon, Cayenne Pepper, Ginger, Sage Root and Grade B Organic Maple Honey, this mixture is for body cleanse and quick water weight loss
Best known as the 'Beyonce diet'


You can consume 3 glasses per day = 32 oz (1 jar per day)
Discounted if you purchase 7day Supply = 7 32oz jars

Or you can purchase the Concentrated bottle/jar which is to be added to a gallon of water. - $20
or 1 part concentration 3 parts water




*Please Consult your physician before commencing this cleanse
The cayenne pepper helps loosen the mucus from the walls of the intestinal tract, the lemon juice cleanses the loosened debris from the body, and the maple syrup contains the nutrients that the body needs while it is detoxing.

name: Infused Spirits & Wine
description:
Your option of:

Peach Moscato Wine
(Infused with Peaches, Pomegranates & Rosemary)

Zesty Zinfandel
(infused with Sweet Peppers & Strawberry)

Berry Red Wine
(a heart healthy wine infused with organic cherries, raspberries, cranberries & pure strawberry extract)

Lemon Drop Vodka
(Infused with organic Lemons & lemon Grass)

Citrus Vodka
(infused with Tangerines, Lemon, Lime and green apples)

Pomegranate Peppermint Vodka
(infused with fresh pomegranates, mint leaves & natural peppermint extracts)

Vanilla Spiced Vodka
(infused with Madagascar Bourbon Vanilla Beans, Cinnamon, Anise & Nutmeg) 

Henny Colada 32 OZ jar
(Hennessy infused with Pineapples and Pure Coconut Extract prior to mixing with Pineapple Juice & cream of Coconut) 

Ginny Gin Gin)
(infused with Persian Cucumbers, Parsley, Sage & Rosemary

Raspberry Gin
(infused with fresh Mint & Raspberries)



*Please Email me if you have a specific Spirit or Wine you would like me to infuse, depending on choice infusion fruits include organic berries, apples, peaches, mints, lychees, mangoes, pinneapples, coconut, lemon zest, persimmons, pomegranates, herbs & more.
